articles.author: Christopher Scarglato
articles.title: Kamala Harris greeted by kids in Ghana as she arrives for weeklong Africa trip - New York Post
articles.description: Vice President Kamala Harris was greeted by schoolchildren, dancers and drummers as she arrived in Ghana for the start of a weeklong visit to Africa.
articles.content: Vice President Kamala Harris was greeted by schoolchildren, dancers and drummers as she arrived Sunday in Ghana for the start of a weeklong visit to Africa intended to deepen U.S. relationships amid … [+4864 chars]

articles.title: Marburg Virus In Africa: 7 Unusual Symptoms of This Ebola-Like Virus You Must Know | TheHealthSite.com - TheHealthSite
articles.description: The ebola-like virus is spreading fast across Africa. Known by the name Marburg virus disease it is extremely rare in nature and has the ability to cause high fatality rate. TheHealthSite.com
